author: Special Correspondent
text:
Power loom societies in the western region are under instructions from the Textiles Ministry to complete the target to produce 30 lakh dhotis and an equal number of saris by this month-end for distribution free to flood-affected peoplenext month.

Representatives of 104 Power loom Cooperative Societies comprising 38 in Erode district, 46 in Namakkal and the rest in Tirupur and Coimbatore districts took part in a recent meeting chaired by Handlooms and Textiles Minister S. Gokula Indira to take stock of the progress.

The Power loom Cooperative Societies had just fulfilled the target set for distribution of dhotis and saris as Pongal freebies for family card holders when the new target was set.

The target for Pongal festival was almost completed during November-December, sources said.

Unlike last year when there was power crisis, this time around power loom societies could generate the momentum of production over the last few months owing to unhindered supply.
title: Manufacture of saris, dhotis will be over this month
